mapper.select: select * from sys_menu a where a.request_url is not null and a.request_url <> '' order by sort

select * from sys_menu a where exists( select 1 from sys_user b,sys_user_role c,sys_role_menu d where b.user_id=c.user_id and c.tenant_id=#{tenantId} and b.user_id=#{userId} and c.role_id=d.role_id and d.menu_id=a.menu_id ) and a.menu_type <> 'button' and a.enable='1' order by sort
select * from sys_menu a where a.menu_type <> 'button' and a.enable='1' order by sort
